<center>

SmallWeb's got it all. We offer DirectAdmin based services in 8 locations around the world including Amsterdam, Germany, Luxembourg, London, Los Angeles, Melbourne, New York and Singapore.

---

**Budget Hosting**

![](https://pbs.twimg.com/media/EhRSNsHXcAA_W1P?format=png&name=large "")

Prices shown are paid yearly - [Order Now!](https://smallweb.net/order/main/packages/budget/?group_id=45 "Order Now!")

---

**Shared Hosting**

Bigger and beefier DirectAdmin website hosting plans using NVMe or SSD storage drives with CloudLinux, Let's Encrypt, Softaculous and much more of the good stuff.

**Shared 5GB** 
Unlimited Domains
Unmetered Bandwidth
1CPU, 30EP, 5MB/s
£1.99/month - [Order Now!](https://smallweb.net/order/config/index/shared/?group_id=44&pricing_id=1406 "Order Now!")

**Shared 10GB** 
Unlimited Domains
Unmetered Bandwidth
1CPU, 30EP, 10MB/s
£2.99/month - [Order Now!](https://smallweb.net/order/config/index/shared/?group_id=44&pricing_id=1354 "Order Now!")

---

**Reseller Hosting**

Perfect if you're growing a large project or you're starting in the industry yourself - whether you're selling to friends and family or the general public we'll take care of you.

**Reseller 10GB**
Unlimited Domains
Unmetered Bandwidth
1CPU, 30EP, 20MB/s
£3.99/month - [Order Now](https://smallweb.net/order/config/index/reseller/?group_id=20&pricing_id=748 "Order Now")!

---

**Email Hosting**

Our email solution, powered by MXroute offers a quality sending relay powered by reputable IP's and a team that cares about your email getting to where it needs to be.

**Email 5GB**
Unlimited Domains/Emails
Crossbox, Roundcube & Rainloop
300 Outbound Emails Per Hour
£19.99/year - [Order Now](https://smallweb.net/order/config/index/email/?group_id=31&pricing_id=1393 "Order Now")!

**Email 10GB**
Unlimited Domains/Emails
Crossbox, Roundcube & Rainloop
300 Outbound Emails Per Hour
£29.99/year - [Order Now](https://smallweb.net/order/config/index/email/?group_id=31&pricing_id=1396 "Order Now")!

---

*We offer 8 locations in total across all of our different service types but not necessarily for each individual service.

SmallWeb Ltd is registered in England & Wales under company 12272693
